EmailTemplate.description: Notifies RS partner that funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.name: DOER Partner - ACH 65%
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Disbursal__c.Loan__c}'s Solar Loan funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Disbursal__c.Partner__c},
BlueWave has disbursed {!Disbursal__c.Amount__c} ({!Disbursal__c.Disbursal_Percentage__c}%) to {!Disbursal__c.Partner__c} for {!Disbursal__c.Loan__c}'s Solar Loan. Please contact a member of our Partner Support team if you do not receive these funds within 5 business days.
If you have not already, please submit the interconnection information. These documents can be uploaded by logging in to your BlueWave Home Solar Loan Portal.
Sincerely, BlueWave Partner Support partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com (888) 817- 2703
